pr_title: Use transparent background in video player

timeline.message: Use transparent background in video player to work around issues with Sony Bravia televisions
Use the "colorMode" setting (since Android 9) to activate HDR in the player activity

Remove custom_player_interface.xml

It was unused and caused confusion about which xml was used for the player (spoiler: it is the VLC one, even for exoplayer). For some reason a view was still used (spinner) so I did the most basic removal of it
Apply the initial hdr fix again
Apply background color to the window instead of the decoration view

timeline.bodyText: Why was the spinner view removed?
timeline.author: thornbill

replies.bodyText: At first I made changes to this file and the spinner wasn't used so I removed it. But I reverted those other changes in a later commit.
replies.author: nielsvanvelzen

replies.bodyText: So should it be restored here also?
replies.author: thornbill

replies.bodyText:
Did some digging and I removed it in commit ec28d32 with this message:

Remove custom_player_interface.xml
It was unused and caused confusion about which xml was used for the player (spoiler: it is the VLC one, even for exoplayer). For some reason a view was still used (spinner) so I did the most basic removal of it

So what happend is that I removed the unused xml file but because of legacy the init function required a reference to the spinner that didn't exists (lol).
The findViewById function would always return null.
replies.author: nielsvanvelzen

replies.bodyText: So it can stay like this
replies.author: nielsvanvelzen
